verses.verse: <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

When a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5087>vows<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> or <S%H7650>swears<s%> an <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H631>bind<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> with a <S%H632>bond,<s%> he shall not <S%H2490>break<s%> his <S%H1697>word;<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that <S%H3318>proceeds<s%> out of his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

"Also when a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5087>vows<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H631>binds<s%> herself by a <S%H632>bond,<s%> being in her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> in her <S%H5271>youth,<s%>

and her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> her <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and her <S%H632>bond<s%> with which she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and her <S%H1>father<s%> holds his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at <S%H5088>her;<s%> then all her vows shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and every <S%H632>bond<s%> with which she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But if her <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5106>disallow<s%> her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>hears,<s%> none of her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or of her <S%H632>bonds<s%> with which she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5545>forgive<s%> <S%H1>her,<s%> because her father disallowed <S%H5106>her.<s%>
"If she has a <S%H376>husband,<s%> while her <S%H5088>vows<s%> are on <S%H4008>her,<s%> or the rash utterance of her <S%H8193>lips,<s%> with which she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%>

and her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H2790>it,<s%> and hold his peace at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H5088>it;<s%> then her vows shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and her <S%H632>bonds<s%> with which she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But if her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H5106>forbids<s%> her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H4008>it,<s%> then he shall make void her vow which is on her, and the rash utterance of her <S%H8193>lips,<s%> with which she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will forgive <S%H5545>her.<s%>
"But the <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H490>widow,<s%> or of her who is <S%H1644>divorced,<s%> everything with which she has <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> shall stand against <S%H6965>her.<s%>
"If she <S%H5087>vowed<s%> in her <S%H376>husband<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> or <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> by a <S%H632>bond<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath,<s%>

and her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2790>it,<s%> and held his peace at <S%H5106>her,<s%> and didn't disallow <S%H5088>her;<s%> then all her vows shall <S%H6965>stand,<s%> and every <S%H632>bond<s%> with which she <S%H631>bound<s%> her <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand.<s%>

But if her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H6565>made<s%> them null and <S%H6565>void<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H4161>them,<s%> then whatever proceeded out of her <S%H8193>lips<s%> concerning her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or concerning the <S%H632>bond<s%> of her <S%H5315>soul,<s%> shall not <S%H6965>stand:<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> has made them <S%H6565>void;<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will forgive <S%H5545>her.<s%>

Every <S%H5088>vow,<s%> and every <S%H632>binding<s%> <S%H7621>oath<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> the <S%H5315>soul,<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> may <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H376>it,<s%> or her husband may make it <S%H6565>void.<s%>

But if her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H2790>altogether<s%> hold his <S%H2790>peace<s%> at her from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day,<s%> then he <S%H6965>establishes<s%> all her <S%H5088>vows,<s%> or all her <S%H632>bonds,<s%> which are on <S%H6965>her:<s%> he has established <S%H2790>them,<s%> because he held his peace at her in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he heard <S%H8085>them.<s%>
But if he shall <S%H6565>make<s%> them null and <S%H6565>void<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5375>them,<s%> then he shall bear her <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>"

These are the <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> between a <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> between a <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> being in her <S%H5271>youth,<s%> in her <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>
